arm_group.description: all patients on their 4th-6th weeks after delivery

brief_summary.textblock:
This research will use the Edinburgh Scale Of Post partum depression to evaluate patients
      during their 4th to 6th after delivery, and the investigators will compare the results with
      those found in other countries with population with similar characteristics as ours

clinical_study.brief_title: Prevalence of Postpartum Depression in Hospital Jose E. Gonzalez

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  patients on their 4th -6th week after delivery, who gave birth in our institution

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  patients with previous diagnosis of psychiatric pathology

study_pop.textblock: 348 patients on their 4th-6th week after delivery

intervention.description: the investigators will apply the qusetionary one time only in the period of time described previously

facility.name: Hospital Universitario Dr Jose E. Gonzalez

clinical_study.official_title: Prevalence of Postpartum Depression in the Jose E. Gonzalez Hospital, Using the Edinburgh Postpartum Depression Scale

overall_official.affiliation: Consejo mexicano de ginecologia y obstetricia
